attributes.action: refuse a peerage to the Speaker Michael Martin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the first Speaker effectively forced from office since 1695 we believe that the soon to be former Speaker Michael Martin does not deserve to be given a peerage and should not be elevated to the House of Lords.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Queen.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
